DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate insertion double balloon device ( DBD ) cervical ripen 12 h v 6 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Ripening With Double Balloon Device 6 Hours Compared With 12 Hours
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control study design : 1 . To assess compare Bishop score remove DBD 12 hour ' v 6hours ' insertion . 2 . To compare efficacy ( vaginal delivery rate time VD ) two arm group 200 woman expect randomized two arm . One randomize DBD removal 12 hour DBD removal 6 hour . Each patient sign inform consent . The following screening complete : medical gynecological history , general physical gynecological examination , ultrasonography exclude contraindication vaginal delivery insertion DBD non stress test ( NST ) baseline . Bishop score assess . After confirm eligibility study , randomization follow group take place . Insertion DBD removal 6 hour follow insertion . Insertion DBD removal 12 hour follow insertion .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Parous patient 18 year age old . 2 . Diagnosed parous pregnant woman indication induction labour . 3 . Having Bishop score 5 less . 4 . Diagnosed singleton pregnancy vertex presentation , intact membrane , significant regular uterine contraction gestational age 37 complete gestational week . 5 . Willingness comply protocol duration study . 6 . Have sign inform consent . 1 . A non vertex presentation 2 . Placenta previa 3 . Ruptured membrane 4 . Documented labour 5 . Foetal distress necessitate immediate intervention 6 . Proven malignancy cervix 7 . Active inflammatory purulent condition lower genital tract 8 . Twin pregnancy 9 . Any contraindication vaginal delivery
